parameter.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results
parameter.name: SNow_sysparm_query

parameter.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields (default: false)
parameter.name: SNow_sysparm_exclude_reference_link

parameter.description: True to supress pagination header (default: false)
parameter.name: SNow_sysparm_suppress_pagination_header

parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response
parameter.name: SNow_sysparm_fields

parameter.description: The maximum number of results returned per page (default: 10,000)
parameter.name: SNow_sysparm_limit

parameter.description: The maximum number of results returned per page (default: 10,000)
parameter.name: SNow_sysparm_view

parameter.description: Name of the query category (read replica category) to use for queries
parameter.name: SNow_sysparm_query_category

parameter.description: True to access data across domains if authorized (default: false)
parameter.name: SNow_sysparm_query_no_domain

parameter.description: Do not execute a select count(*) on table (default: false)
parameter.name: SNow_sysparm_no_count

parameter.description: ID of the project or folder to contain the task. If not included in the request, the task is created in the Default folder.
parameter.name: containerId
